error.message: Class Drupal\Tests\first_paragraph\Unit\FirstParagraphTest extends deprecated class Drupal\system\Tests\Entity\EntityUnitTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.1.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\KernelTests\Core\Entity\EntityKernelTestBase instead.

Call to deprecated function entity_create(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use The method overriding Entity::create() for the entity type, e.g. \Drupal\node\Entity\Node::create() if the entity type is known. If the entity type is variable, use the entity storage's create() method to construct a new entity:

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to first_paragraph.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
